attributes.title: Bioshock Rap - "Rapture Rising"
attributes.caption: One of our favorite games of all time (Bioshock) FINALLY gets a rap.
attributes.description: One of our favorite games of all time (Bioshock) FINALLY gets a rap.

attributes.title: Hello Neighbor Song Parody - "Goodbye Neighbor"
attributes.caption: The perfect song parody for Hello Neighbor to a classic hit song by Supertramp.
attributes.description: The perfect song parody for Hello Neighbor to a classic hit song by Supertramp.

attributes.title: Resident Evil 7 Rap - "Shadow of Myself"
attributes.caption: Resident Evil 7 was a pleasant surprise for us personally and we made this song on a whim when we never had any original intentions in covering this game.
attributes.description: Resident Evil 7 was a pleasant surprise for us personally and we made this song on a whim when we never had any original intentions in covering this game.

attributes.title: Ark Survival Evolved Rap - "Apex Predator"
attributes.caption: We have been LOVING Ark and decided it was about time that we made a song for it! Big thanks for Dan Bull for jumping on the track.
attributes.description: We have been LOVING Ark and decided it was about time that we made a song for it! Big thanks for Dan Bull for jumping on the track.

attributes.title: Bioshock Song - "Circus of Value"
attributes.caption: WELCOME TO THE CIRCUS OF VALUEEEEE. This was a credit song for our Bioshock Rap and you all seemed to dig it...so here's the full version!
attributes.description: WELCOME TO THE CIRCUS OF VALUEEEEE. This was a credit song for our Bioshock Rap and you all seemed to dig it...so here's the full version!

attributes.title: For Honor Rap - "Deus Vult"
attributes.caption: This game has Vikings in it so we worked with Norwegian metal musicians to do the instrumental to this For Honor Rap. BIG thanks to the band TrollfesT for their work! We hope this song does the game justice!
attributes.description: This game has Vikings in it so we worked with Norwegian metal musicians to do the instrumental to this For Honor Rap. BIG thanks to the band TrollfesT for their work! We hope this song does the game justice!

attributes.title: Tattletail Rap
attributes.caption: Yayyyy more mechanical and cute things we can be terrified of! Here's the JT Music Tattletail Rap! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden and DAGames for their vocals.
attributes.description: Yayyyy more mechanical and cute things we can be terrified of! Here's the JT Music Tattletail Rap! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden and DAGames for their vocals.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed 3 Rap REDUX - "Born into Revolution"
attributes.caption: Here's a redux of one of our all time favorite JT Music songs. "Born into Revolution", our Assassin's Creed 3 Rap gets revisited 5 years later.
attributes.description: Here's a redux of one of our all time favorite JT Music songs. "Born into Revolution", our Assassin's Creed 3 Rap gets revisited 5 years later.
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed 3 Rap REDUX - "Born into Revolution"

attributes.title: Mass Effect Andromeda Rap - "Feels Like Home"
attributes.caption: Who knew Madonna and Mass Effect would make sense when mixed together?
attributes.description: Who knew Madonna and Mass Effect would make sense when mixed together?
attributes.display_title: Mass Effect Andromeda Rap - "Feels Like Home"

attributes.title: Happy Wheels Rap - "To Victory"
attributes.caption: Happy Wheels...a masochistic jubilation. Here's the JT Music Happy Wheels Rap!!! Blast it as you run through some levels!
attributes.description: Happy Wheels...a masochistic jubilation. Here's the JT Music Happy Wheels Rap!!! Blast it as you run through some levels!

attributes.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine Rap - "Can't Be Erased"
attributes.caption: A terrifying Ink monster loosely based off of Disney stuff? Sign me up.
attributes.description: A terrifying Ink monster loosely based off of Disney stuff? Sign me up.
attributes.display_title: Bendy and the Ink Machine Rap - "Can't Be Erased"

attributes.title: PUBG Rap Song - "The Last Man To Stand"
attributes.caption: We've been loving Battlegrounds and put this dope track together with Thick44 of Neebs Gaming!
attributes.description: We've been loving Battlegrounds and put this dope track together with Thick44 of Neebs Gaming!
attributes.display_title: PUBG Rap Song - "The Last Man To Stand"

attributes.title: Prey Rap - "Open Your Eyes"
attributes.caption: No one told us this game is a lot like BioShock...WE LOVE THAT. We had to make this Prey Rap. Nemraps from NerdOut also joins us on the track and crushes it!
attributes.description: No one told us this game is a lot like BioShock...WE LOVE THAT. We had to make this Prey Rap. Nemraps from NerdOut also joins us on the track and crushes it!

attributes.title: Battlesloths Rap - "Like a Sloth"
attributes.caption: A song for Battlesloths 2025 The Great Pizza Wars! We had a lot of fun making this song and it features 3-Toe, MC Snuggles and Nap Daddy of the Beastly Boys.
attributes.description: A song for Battlesloths 2025 The Great Pizza Wars! We had a lot of fun making this song and it features 3-Toe, MC Snuggles and Nap Daddy of the Beastly Boys.

attributes.title: Perception Rap Song - "Echoes"
attributes.caption: This game Perception intrigued us...you play as a blind girl in a haunted mansion. Better yet, the game is made by ex-Bioshock devs. We decided it deserved a song! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: This game Perception intrigued us...you play as a blind girl in a haunted mansion. Better yet, the game is made by ex-Bioshock devs. We decided it deserved a song! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Injustice 2 Rap - "Injustice"
attributes.caption: Move over Avengers, the Justice League is here to rap and sing their hearts out. Thanks to Rockit Gaming for their verses and production.
attributes.description: Move over Avengers, the Justice League is here to rap and sing their hearts out. Thanks to Rockit Gaming for their verses and production.

attributes.title: Little Nightmares Rap Song - "Hungry for Another One"
attributes.caption: This game is a gem for sure and we wanted to make a song that fit the universe of Little Nightmares. We hope we did it justice with this song! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: This game is a gem for sure and we wanted to make a song that fit the universe of Little Nightmares. We hope we did it justice with this song! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.display_title: Little Nightmares Rap Song - "Hungry for Another One"

attributes.title: Crash Bandicoot Rap - "The Ooda-Booga Boobie"
attributes.caption: Get ready for an N Sane Crash Bandicoot Rap!!! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: Get ready for an N Sane Crash Bandicoot Rap!!! Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Rick and Morty Rap - "Get Schwifty Numero Dos"
attributes.caption: What do you do when you find out you can do a decent Rick and Morty impersonation? You make a rap song.
attributes.description: What do you do when you find out you can do a decent Rick and Morty impersonation? You make a rap song.
attributes.display_title: Rick and Morty Rap - "Get Schwifty Numero Dos"

attributes.title: Lawbreakers Rap - "Time to Break"
attributes.caption: This song is so fire it's almost criminal. I guess we're Breakers.
attributes.description: This song is so fire it's almost criminal. I guess we're Breakers.

attributes.title: Dream Daddy Song - "The Dream Daddy For Me"
attributes.caption: Here's our Dream Daddy Song! Hope you like 90s boy band music and hot dads, cause that's what you're getting.
attributes.description: Here's our Dream Daddy Song! Hope you like 90s boy band music and hot dads, cause that's what you're getting.
attributes.display_title: Dream Daddy Song - "The Dream Daddy For Me"

attributes.title: Subnautica Rap - "Don't Hold Your Breath"
attributes.caption: Water you waiting for? Go watch this Subnautica Rap!
attributes.description: Water you waiting for? Go watch this Subnautica Rap!

attributes.title: Destiny 2 Rap - "Fireborn"
attributes.caption: Greetings fellow Guardians! Here's your new anthem to blast as you slay the Cabal Legions! Special thanks to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: Greetings fellow Guardians! Here's your new anthem to blast as you slay the Cabal Legions! Special thanks to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Cuphead Rap
attributes.caption: We spit hot fire and mean cup puns in this Cuphead Rap
attributes.description: We spit hot fire and mean cup puns in this Cuphead Rap

attributes.title: Shadow of War - "Embrace My Curse"
attributes.caption: Ready to take Sauron out? If not, this song should put some fire in your heart and get you ready to do so.
attributes.description: Ready to take Sauron out? If not, this song should put some fire in your heart and get you ready to do so.

attributes.title: The Evil Within 2 Song - "Don't Wake Me Up"
attributes.caption: Can Sebastian find his daughter? I don't know, but he sings about trying to in this The Evil Within 2 Song!
attributes.description: Can Sebastian find his daughter? I don't know, but he sings about trying to in this The Evil Within 2 Song!
attributes.display_title: The Evil Within 2 Song - "Don't Wake Me Up"

attributes.title: Pickle Rick Rap
attributes.caption: Pickle Rick can do anything a man can. And if he wants to Rap, then he can rap, k?
attributes.description: Pickle Rick can do anything a man can. And if he wants to Rap, then he can rap, k?

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Origins Rap - "I'm The Creed"
attributes.caption: Assassin's Creed is back and it's taking us to ancient Egypt!
attributes.description: Assassin's Creed is back and it's taking us to ancient Egypt!
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed Origins Rap - "I'm The Creed"

attributes.title: Call of Duty WW2 Rap - "Boots on the Ground"
attributes.caption: Finally! CoD is back to its roots and we love it. We take this song back to our roots too and pump it full of throwbacks from our past CoD Songs.
attributes.description: Finally! CoD is back to its roots and we love it. We take this song back to our roots too and pump it full of throwbacks from our past CoD Songs. Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty WW2 Rap - "Boots on the Ground"

attributes.title: Wolfenstein 2 Rap - "Terror Billy"
attributes.caption: A rap no one should be offended by. Nazis are dicks.
attributes.description: A rap no one should be offended by. Nazis are dicks.

attributes.title: Star Wars Battlefront 2 Rap - "Stomp Out Their Hope"
attributes.caption: Dark side...light side...who do you fight for in Star Wars Battlefront 2?!
attributes.description: Dark side...light side...who do you fight for in Star Wars Battlefront 2?! We pit the dark and light against each other in this rap, enjoy!
attributes.display_title: Star Wars Battlefront 2 Rap - "Stomp Out Their Hope"

attributes.title: Video Game Legends Rap, Vol. 3 - "Indie Games Rap"
attributes.caption: Video Game Legends makes a return after a two year hiatus. A lot has happened since then, but he emergence of the indie game has been hard to miss. So we dedicated the next VGL to Indie Games!
attributes.description: Video Game Legends makes a return after a two year hiatus. A lot has happened since then, but the emergence of the indie game has been hard to miss. So we dedicated the next VGL to Indie Games!
attributes.display_title: Video Game Legends Rap, Vol. 3 - "Indie Games Rap"

attributes.title: Rainbow Six Siege Rap - "Knock Knock"
attributes.caption: You've been asking for this for years and we've finally came around to making a Rainbow Six Siege Rap.
attributes.description: You've been asking for this for years and we've finally came around to making a Rainbow Six Siege Rap.
